ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois was sitting around in Terminess lab, when he heard some strange footsteps leave the door. Vulois goes to investigate, but he foinds he s been locked

Vulois was sitting around in Terminess' lab, when he heard some 
strange footsteps leave the door. Vulois goes to investigate, but he 
foinds he's been locked in!

"Someone just heard our conversation! Computer, open door code Vulois 
Alpha 3!

Computer: Sorry, no such authorization code for low ranking Predacon 
bot Vulois.

"WHAT!?! Oh, that lying little...... He didn't do anything! We have 
to get out that door and find whoever heard our conversation!

Vulois turned to Tank mode and loaded up a missle.

"No!" shouted Terminess, "We can't blow the door open. We have to 
pick it."

Termines pulled out a kit from her arm(much like the one Rat Trap 
used in the episode where he faked being a Pred) and waved it over 
the door. It made some funny sounds, and than opened.

"Let's go!"

Vulois and Terminess ran out of the room. Vulois called back to 
Battera

'If you want to go home, you'll follow us!"
